name: Hammer an Altar until you die
Craft Potions: Luck (any type)
Consume a flask
Obtain 5 different Yo-Yos
Catch a fairy and use it underground
Defeat a Hardmode enemy without entering Hardmode
Wear one of the Vanity Contest winner sets
Sell a Flaming Mace
Destroy all the leaf blocks from a living tree (free if no living trees)
Never use platforms
Deal 100% of all damage to Wall of Flesh with 0 Defense
Go to the entrance of the Lihzahrd Temple
Craft a Gravedigger's shovel and destroy 500 blocks with it
Have 5 debuffs at the same time
Have each slot in your inventory be taken up by a different building block
Wear a full set of Fossil armor
Trash Shark Bait item
Deal 100% of all damage to any boss while on a minecart
Kill the Clothier
Place 5 different types of toilets
Defeat Queen Bee with no more than 200 health
Complete 3 Fishing Quests
Create the following biome: Evil Desert
Fill the inventory of a Piggy Bank
Defeat unique bosses using only each of the following classes: Ranger, Summoner
